Extract zones based on rotation axis

Source: R/CreateZoning3.R
zone.rotation.fun.Rd

Extract zones based on rotation axis

Usage

zone.rotation.fun(
  img,
  k = c(3, 4),
  kk = 5,
  mm = c(2000, 4000),
  select.layer = NULL
)

Arguments

img

array/matrix/SpatRaster - source image

k

numeric vector - which cuts to keep (length 2)

kk

numeric - total number of cuts

mm

numeric vector - region limits (length 2)

select.layer

Integer. Specifies which layer to use if the input is a multi-band image. Default is `NULL`.

Value

SpatRaster - extracted rotation zone

Examples

data(seg_Oulanka2023_Session01_T067)
img = terra::rast(seg_Oulanka2023_Session01_T067)
rotationZone = zone.rotation.fun(img, k = c(1,2), kk = 7, mm = c(1500,3000))
